content: Heather MooreYesterday 1:45 PMI also noticed this but, it seems like the basic premise is very relevant to what we are learning today. That is nice but, I do agree with what people have said above, I wish we would have more information that is more recent.

Heather MooreYesterday 4:50 PMI think that I'm definitely more Type B and I can relate to the last sentence in that section.  I would consider myself in between a statistician and full on coder. 1 Heart reaction.1

Heather MooreYesterday 1:43 PMData Science Handbook Chapter 22Kunal Punera talks about some of the skills that he looks for when hiring for a data scientist position. I think this is very relevant especially since most of will be looking to find or progress further in this field. He talks about how he likes candidates with a strong fundamentals. Candidates should be able to have a systematic view and should be able to explain their reasoning for using different techniques.

Heather MooreYesterday 1:51 PMThis is very true. You can only get a glimpse of the picture with out subject matter experts. They can be helpful in every part of these steps. Their background is essential to finding the solution to a data problem.
